scripts.ci-vue-base: node_modules/.bin/cross-env  PAGE_TITLE="Base - No plugin" FILE=/../app/vue-base/index.html STATIC=dist SCRIPT=dist npm test
scripts.ci-vue-plugin-nuxt-with-imports: node_modules/.bin/cross-env  PAGE_TITLE="vue-nuxt" FILE=/../app/vue-nuxt/dist/index.html FRAGMENT="#/index-with-imports" STATIC=app/vue-nuxt/dist SCRIPT=dist npm test
scripts.ci-vue-plugin-nuxt-without-imports: node_modules/.bin/cross-env  PAGE_TITLE="vue-nuxt" FILE=/../app/vue-nuxt/dist/index.html FRAGMENT="#/index-without-imports" STATIC=app/vue-nuxt/dist SCRIPT=dist npm test
scripts.ci-vue-plugin-with-imports: node_modules/.bin/cross-env  PAGE_TITLE="Plugin - Imports - Yes" FILE=/../app/vue-plugin/with-imports/index.html STATIC=dist SCRIPT=dist npm test
scripts.ci-vue-plugin-without-imports: node_modules/.bin/cross-env  PAGE_TITLE="Plugin - Imports - No" FILE=/../app/vue-plugin/without-imports/index.html STATIC=dist SCRIPT=dist npm test
scripts.ci-vue-plugin-ts-with-imports: node_modules/.bin/cross-env  PAGE_TITLE="Plugin - TS - Imports - Yes" FILE=/../app/vue-typescript/with-imports/index.html STATIC=dist SCRIPT=dist npm test
scripts.ci-vue-plugin-ts-without-imports: node_modules/.bin/cross-env  PAGE_TITLE="Plugin - TS - Imports - No" FILE=/../app/vue-typescript/without-imports/index.html STATIC=dist SCRIPT=dist npm test
scripts.ci-vue-plugin-ts-class-with-imports: node_modules/.bin/cross-env  PAGE_TITLE="Plugin - TS - Class - Imports - Yes" FILE=/../app/vue-typescript-class/with-imports/index.html STATIC=dist SCRIPT=dist npm test
scripts.ci-vue-plugin-ts-class-without-imports: node_modules/.bin/cross-env  PAGE_TITLE="Plugin - TS - Class - Imports - No" FILE=/../app/vue-typescript-class/without-imports/index.html STATIC=dist SCRIPT=dist npm test
scripts.e2e: npm run ci-vue-base && npm run ci-vue-plugin-nuxt-with-imports && npm run ci-vue-plugin-nuxt-without-imports && npm run ci-vue-plugin-with-imports && npm run ci-vue-plugin-without-imports && npm run ci-vue-plugin-ts-with-imports && npm run ci-vue-plugin-ts-without-imports && npm run ci-vue-plugin-ts-class-with-imports && npm run ci-vue-plugin-ts-class-without-imports
